text: Swiss authorities have confirmed that all victims of the recent bar fire disaster in Switzerland have been identified.
According to official reports, the identification process has been completed, bringing closure to the families of those who lost their lives in the tragic incident.
The cause of the fire is currently under investigation, with officials working to determine the circumstances surrounding the blaze.

The identification of the victims marks an important step in the aftermath of the disaster, allowing loved ones to begin the grieving process and providing a sense of resolution as the community comes to terms with the loss.
